statements: SELECT * FROM chat_messages;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT sender_id, message, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_id, message FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 3 OR receiver_id = 4;
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS latest_message FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT message FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 3 AND receiver_id = 4;
SELECT timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND receiver_id NOT IN (4, 5) ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 5 OR receiver_id = 6 ORDER BY message_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message_text, message_timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = 2;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM chat_messages WHERE message_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = 3 ORDER BY message_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, join_date FROM users WHERE join_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY message_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, join_date FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY join_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, join_date FROM users WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM chat_messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user1_id, user2_id, last_message FROM conversations ORDER BY last_message_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01' AND registration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT conversation_id, last_message, last_message_timestamp FROM conversations WHERE last_message IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 1 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT message_text, created_at FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 2 AND receiver_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM conversations WHERE user1_id = 1 OR user2_id = 2 ORDER BY start_timestamp ASC;
SELECT message_id, reader_id, read_timestamp FROM message_reads WHERE message_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 2 AND receiver_id = 3;
SELECT message_text, created_at FROM messages WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_table;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_table WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_table ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM message_table WHERE sender_id = 2 AND receiver_id = 3;
SELECT message_id, message_text, timestamp FROM message_table ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM user_table WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT username FROM user_table WHERE user_id = 50;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM conversation_table GROUP BY user1_id, user2_id;
SELECT * FROM message_table ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, status FROM message_status_table WHERE status = 'delivered';
